languages.text: Похоже, записи Паломника оказались правдивы — под бесконечными слоями снега и льда вашим авгурам удалось засечь очертания имперских строений, о назначении которых пока остается лишь догадываться.

traits.locale_text: Похоже, записи Паломника оказались правдивы — под бесконечными слоями снега и льда вашим авгурам удалось засечь очертания имперских строений, о назначении которых пока остается лишь догадываться.

languages.text: It looks like the Pilgrim's records were true, your augurs managed to locate the shapes of several Imperial buildings under layers of snow and ice, though one can only guess what purpose they used to serve.
languages.original_text: Похоже, записи Паломника оказались правдивы — под бесконечными слоями снега и льда вашим авгурам удалось засечь очертания имперских строений, о назначении которых пока остается лишь догадываться.

traits.locale_text: It looks like the Pilgrim's records were true, your augurs managed to locate the shapes of Imperial buildings under layers of snow and ice, though one can only guess what purpose they used to serve.
It looks like the Pilgrim's records were true, your augurs managed to locate the shapes of Imperial buildings under layers of snow and ice, though one can only guess what purpose they used to serve.

It looks like the Pilgrim's records were true, your augurs managed to locate the shapes of several Imperial buildings under layers of snow and ice, though one can only guess what purpose they used to serve.

It looks like the Pilgrim's records were true, your augurs managed to locate the shapes of several Imperial buildings under layers of snow and ice, though one can only guess what purpose they used to serve.

It looks like the Pilgrim's records were true, your augurs managed to locate the shapes of several Imperial buildings under layers of snow and ice, though one can only guess what purpose they used to serve.

languages.text: 看来朝圣者的文件都是真的，你的俄歇矩阵成功地在皑皑冰雪下发现了基座建筑，看起来像是帝国的建筑。至于这些建筑曾是用来做什么的，恐怕只能靠猜测了。
languages.original_text: It looks like the Pilgrim's records were true, your augurs managed to locate the shapes of several Imperial buildings under layers of snow and ice, though one can only guess what purpose they used to serve.

traits.locale_text: 看来朝圣者的文件都是真的，你的俄歇矩阵成功地在皑皑冰雪下发现了基座建筑，看起来像是帝国的建筑。至于这些建筑曾是用来做什么的，恐怕只能靠猜测了。

languages.text: ピルグリムの記録は真実だったようだ。スキャンは、雪と氷の層の下に帝国の建物の形を複数見つけることができたが、それらがどのような目的で使われていたのかは推測することしかできない。
languages.original_text: It looks like the Pilgrim's records were true, your augurs managed to locate the shapes of several Imperial buildings under layers of snow and ice, though one can only guess what purpose they used to serve.

traits.locale_text: ピルグリムの記録は真実だったようだ。スキャンは、雪と氷の層の下に帝国の建物の形を複数見つけることができたが、それらがどのような目的で使われていたのかは推測することしかできない。

languages.text: Parece que los informes del Peregrino eran ciertos, tus augures consiguen localizar las formas de varios edificios imperiales bajo capas de nieve y hielo, aunque solo se puede intuir para qué servían.
languages.original_text: It looks like the Pilgrim's records were true, your augurs managed to locate the shapes of several Imperial buildings under layers of snow and ice, though one can only guess what purpose they used to serve.

traits.locale_text: Parece que los informes del Peregrino eran ciertos, tus augures consiguen localizar las formas de varios edificios imperiales bajo capas de nieve y hielo, aunque solo se puede intuir para qué servían.

languages.text: Die Daten des Pilgers waren offenbar korrekt. Deine Auguren konnten unter Schichten aus Schnee und Eis die Umrisse mehrerer imperialer Gebäude entdecken, auch wenn sich nur raten lässt, welchen Zweck sie einmal gedient haben mögen.
languages.original_text: It looks like the Pilgrim's records were true, your augurs managed to locate the shapes of several Imperial buildings under layers of snow and ice, though one can only guess what purpose they used to serve.

traits.locale_text: Die Daten des Pilgers waren offenbar korrekt. Deine Auguren konnten unter Schichten aus Schnee und Eis die Umrisse mehrerer imperialer Gebäude entdecken, auch wenn sich nur raten lässt, welchen Zweck sie einmal gedient haben mögen.

languages.text: Apparemment, les documents du Pèlerin disaient vrai. Vos augures parviennent à repérer sous les couches de glace et de neige les contours de plusieurs bâtiments impériaux dont la vocation exacte reste un mystère.
languages.original_text: It looks like the Pilgrim's records were true, your augurs managed to locate the shapes of several Imperial buildings under layers of snow and ice, though one can only guess what purpose they used to serve.

traits.locale_text: Apparemment, les documents du Pèlerin disaient vrai. Vos augures parviennent à repérer sous les couches de glace et de neige les contours de plusieurs bâtiments impériaux dont la vocation exacte reste un mystère.

languages.text: Görünüşe göre Seyyah'ın kayıtları doğruymuş. Alametler, kar ve buz tabakasının altında İmparatorluk binasına benzeyen birkaç yapı tespit ediyor. Şimdilik bu yapıların ne amaçla kullanıldığını saptamak mümkün değil.
languages.original_text: It looks like the Pilgrim's records were true, your augurs managed to locate the shapes of several Imperial buildings under layers of snow and ice, though one can only guess what purpose they used to serve.
